scripts.build: npm run lint && rimraf dist && tsc && cp sample/* dist/ && cp -R node_modules/ dist/
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.deploy-aws: npm run build && cp -f aws.yml dist/serverless.yml && cd dist/ && serverless deploy
scripts.deploy-gcf: npm run build && cp -f gcf.yml dist/serverless.yml && cd dist/ && serverless deploy
